headline: Global Express and Small Parcels Delivery Market Report 2025-2029: Competitive Analysis of FedEx, UPS, USPS, SF Express, DHL Group, IDS (Royal Mail / GLS), La Poste
summary: The Global Express & Small Parcels market offers key opportunities in e-commerce demand, China's express growth, last-mile delivery innovations, and sustainability. Technology investments and regional expansion, notably in Asia Pacific, present further opportunities.
